C

Carte - Class in modele.occupant.objetFixe
The Carte class is a subclass of ObjetFixe that redirects Hunters towards the treasure and randomizes the direction of other mobile objects.
Carte(char, Position, Grille) - Constructor for class modele.occupant.objetFixe.Carte
 
Cheater - Class in modele.occupant.objetMobile
The "Cheater" class redirects a mobile object towards the opposite direction of a treasure on a grid.
Cheater(char, Position, Grille) - Constructor for class modele.occupant.objetMobile.Cheater
 
ChoixPanel(String[], JPanel, fenettre) - Method in class controleur.controle
This function creates a panel with buttons based on an array of choices, and when a button is clicked, it retrieves the index of the selected choice and performs some actions.
containObjetFixe(Position, Grille) - Method in class modele.occupant.objetFixe.Pierre
This Java function checks if a given position in a grid contains a fixed object and returns it if it does.
containObjetMobile(Position, Grille) - Method in class modele.occupant.objetFixe.Pierre
This Java function checks if a mobile object is present at a given position in a grid and returns the object if found.
containObjetMobile(Position, Grille) - Method in class modele.occupant.objetMobile.ObjetMobile
This function checks if a mobile object is present at a given position in a grid.
containPierre(Position, Grille) - Method in class modele.occupant.objetFixe.Pierre
This function checks if a given position in a grid contains a stone.
containPierre(Position, Grille) - Method in class modele.occupant.objetMobile.ObjetMobile
This function checks if a given position in a grid contains a stone.
controle - Class in controleur
The "controle" class contains methods for generating a graphical user interface for a treasure hunt game and creating a panel with buttons based on an array of choices.
controle(grilleDeJeux, TexteAction, fenettre) - Constructor for class controleur.controle
 
controleur - package controleur
 
createCarte(int, int) - Method in class modele.Jeux
This function creates a Carte object with a specified position and adds it to a game board.
createCheater() - Method in class modele.Jeux
This Java function creates a Cheater object at a random empty position on a game board.
createGlue(int, int) - Method in class modele.Jeux
This Java function creates a glue object at a specified position and adds it to a game board.
createHunter(int, int, int, int) - Method in class modele.Jeux
The function creates a new Hunter object with a given position and direction, adds it to a list of mobile objects, and assigns it a unique identifier.
createHunter() - Method in class modele.Jeux
This function creates a new Hunter object and adds it to a list of mobile objects if there is an available position on the game board.
createSage(int, int, int, int) - Method in class modele.Jeux
The function creates a Sage object with a given position and direction and adds it to a list of mobile objects.
createTesor() - Method in class modele.Jeux
This function creates a treasure object at a random empty position on a game board.
createTool(int, int) - Method in class modele.Jeux
This Java function creates a tool object at a specified position and adds it to a game board.
creeGrilleDeJeux() - Method in class vue.grilleDeJeux
This function creates a grid layout and populates it with panels that display images of grass and occupants in a game.
CustomParm - Class in vue
The CustomParm class is used to create a custom parameter object with different percentage values for different game elements.
CustomParm(int, int, int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class vue.CustomParm
 
CustomParm(Jeux, fenettre) - Constructor for class vue.CustomParm
